TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UidPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class UidPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class UidPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示提供 [X:uid 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-uid-directive.md)值的类的 CLR 属性。

span.span: Indicates the CLR property of a class that provides the [x:Uid Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-uid-directive.md) value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个 XAML 语言属性，以便其能够唯一识别标识标记中的元素节点。The is a XAML language attribute that identifies element nodes in markup so that they can be uniquely identified. 尽管的模型`x:Uid`可能更通用，因此，需要本地化的 XAML 语言组件可以生成伴随本地化源 XAML 元素的唯一标识符的一种用法是用于本地化工具，然后重新与在原始 XAML 集成。Although the model for `x:Uid` is potentially more general, one usage of unique identifiers for XAML elements is for localization tools, so that XAML language components that need localization can generate a companion localization source and then re-integrated with the original XAML. 有关详细信息如何`x:Uid`WPF 本地化中使用。For more information on how `x:Uid` is used in WPF localization. 请参阅[WPF 全球化和本地化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-globalization-and-localization-overview.md)。see [WPF Globalization and Localization Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-globalization-and-localization-overview.md). 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类特定于 WPF 程序集 WindowsBase 中存在。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).
